Download GenBank

Source: R/setup.R
download_genbank.Rd

Download .seq.tar files from the latest GenBank release. The user interacitvely selects the parts of GenBank to download (e.g. primates, plants, bacteria ...)

download_genbank(overwrite = FALSE)

Arguments

overwrite

T/F, overwrite pre-existing downloaded files?

Details

The downloaded files will appear in the restez filepath under downloads.

See also

Other setup: check_status, create_database, create_demo_database, delete_database, get_restez_path, set_restez_path, unset_restez_path

Examples

# NOT RUN {
library(restez)
set_restez_path(filepath = 'path/for/downloads')
download_genbank()
# }
